nodes.text: Juvan, also known as rejuv, was a medicinal substance used for healing during the High Republic Era. By around 232 BBY, juvan was being supplanted by bacta. Scantech Merven Getter of the Hetzal system thought about this fact while on duty at the beginning of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, as Hetzal was attempting to get into bacta production. Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis also noted that rejuv was being replaced after learning that a derelict starship she was investigating had carried a cargo of Vratixian barley, a component of bacta.
Juvan was first mentioned in in the novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi. It was first identified as rejuv in The High Republic 2.
